scripts.release: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp README.md dist && mkdir dist/images && cp -r images dist && mkdir dist/src && cp node_modules/aframe-controller-cursor-component/dist/aframe-controller-cursor-component.min.js dist/src && cp node_modules/aframe/dist/aframe-master.js dist/src && cp node_modules/aframe/dist/aframe-master.js.map dist/src && cp node_modules/aframe-extras/dist/aframe-extras.min.js dist/src && cp node_modules/aframe-particle-system-component/dist/aframe-particle-system-component.min.js dist/src && cp favicon.png dist && cp -r bin dist && cp package.json dist && ts-node tools/cleanup.ts
